scripts.dev-frontends: clear && cd manager && yarn dev & cd events && yarn dev
scripts.build-all: yarn build-backend & yarn build-manager & yarn build-events
scripts.deploy-backend: cd backend && yarn && cd .. git subtree split -P backend/build -b deploy-backend && git push origin deploy-backend
scripts.deploy-manager: git checkout deploy-manager && git merge main && git add -A && git push origin deploy-manager && git checkout main
scripts.deploy-events: git checkout deploy-events && git merge main && git add -A && git push origin deploy-events && git checkout main
